title: IT SuperUser/IT Specialista

text: For us, SOC is not just logging or monitoring but it is a comprehensive threat management tool of which logging is only one component. Our understanding of SOC includes Monitoring and Incident Detection, Investigating Incidents and their remediation and also support services such as Vulnerability Management and Threat Intelligence, technologically and from the perspective of terms of all related processes. We deliver service to client which consists of analysis of events in Security Information and Event Management (SIEM) system and response to security incidents and we provide additional expertise (Vulnerability management, … ) when demanded. Marek is Head of Cyber Operations with over 8 years of experience with cyber security and consulting, building relationships across various teams on local and international level. His experience is coming from multiple international corporations where we are running SOCs, doing SOC transformations, assessments and incident response activities. He considers himself as a self-driven person with a high focus on technical capability and building opportunities based on trust with all stakeholders. He is focused on finding the evil in the enterprise networks and automation. In his free time he likes travelling, spending time with friends, good food and watching movies. For our client facing SOC team we seek a colleague with information security background. Purpose of the position is to help client responding to current threat vectors. Security Operations Center L1 analyst is the first level of monitoring in the SOC. Role combines reviewing of events in SIEM, escalating incidents based on scenarios, reporting based on current needs. We seek someone with passion and desire to live in Information Security field, who wants to grow in a global and challenging environment. This position is suitable for someone who prefers / don't mind night shifts or as a entry level position to Cyber Security field. PwC is the largest audit team in the Czech Republic, law, tax, consulting and technology, data or forensic teams. Find out how easy it is to combine this knowledge when you're in the right place. With us, you will get the opportunity to see how business is done in large companies. We are part of an international network of companies with more than 327,000 colleagues in 155 countries. Once you've applied for a position, our recruiter for the Risk Assurance team will contact you . You'll then have an interview/selection process. If you're successful and you also get along with the hiring manager, you're good to go and start your career! About the Team About the Manager Job description & summary Requirement of the role What we are offering Basic Cyber Security awareness. General understanding of common threat vectors on the internet. Basic knowledge of operating systems (Windows, Linux, Unix...) Advanced knowledge of Microsoft Office suite. Professional working level on English. 1+ years of information security practice or technical or administrative experience. University degree focused on IT or Cyber Security. Information security background with hands-on experience. Expertise in any of the following areas: Security, Networking, Windows or Linux hands-on experience. Concentrated experience and rapid career growth. It may sound like a platitude, but it really is. Fair wages plus paid overtime and annual bonus. Paid time off 20 + 5 days, 3 sick days and 2 extra days off from the company at the end of the year. High-end Ultrabook and iPhone with unlimited data. Benefit program with 30.000 points that you can use for holidays, education, food vouchers, sports (Multisport), health... Simply on what you enjoy. Support for your education and development: business and digital trainings, technical certifications (e.g. SANS) or whatever that makes sense and it's related to your job etc.. Possibility of Secondments - opportunity to work at a foreign PwC office in the future - for example in the USA, Canada etc.. Extra-work activities and Away Days (team building, ski weekend, etc..) Regular feedback on your work, also consultation with a coach with whom you can address your further development and career direction. Nic to have:
title: Junior Security Operations Center Analyst (night&day shifts)

text: …you’ll be able to take part in developing unique medical technologies (from the initial idea, all the way to getting the product made on our own mass production lines). …we develop products that are used in 80 countries worldwide, producing over 30,000 devices a year. …we work in small project teams, your work will be visible! …together, we overcome significant work challenges, but also enjoy challenges outside of work, like cold water training in the Džbán reservoir. …you’ll have a free hand to do your job and responsibility for the tasks assigned. …you’ll share and extend your know-how with the top developers / experts / professionals in the field. Regular monitoring visits to the clinical investigation sites to check the progress and accurateness of the documentation.  University education (an advantage, but not a condition-biomedical/science/statistical major). Ability to work with data - analysis and presentation. English and Czech language at a high level, spoken and written. Good work organization and analytical thinking. Willingness to learn and develop new skills, take the initiative, and responsibility for assigned tasks. Are you used to 5 weeks of holidays, sick days and language courses? Great, old habits die hard and that’s how we do things here. For us, work-life balance is more than just a phrase. Think of flexible hours and working from home. If you’d like to educate yourself, our support for training and workshops is unlimited. There’s always something to celebrate. We celebrate anniversaries, birthdays and hand out medals for years “served” in BTL (and bonuses, of course). Are you sugar-driven? Our five kitchens are stuffed full of sweets to keep you going. And finally we’d like to mention that… Do you think you might like it here? It makes sense to us. Does it make sense to you?

text:
This is an experienced role responsible for Dataclair AI solutions. We're looking for candidates with strong experience in the design, architecture and coding of SW solutions who want to move further – towards building machine learning products and designing data science solutions.
We call it a transformative position as we give you an opportunity to bring your current SW development skills and knowledge of the best practices to the table, and at the same time, to become native in machine learning and data science. Completing an intensive crash course and ML bootcamp will be the first step of your new career in Dataclair.
In your daily work, you will:
Crack challenging problems of how to develop, productionalize and deploy machine learning models over messy telco big data
Design efficient and reusable modules/systems/pipelines that drive complex Machine Learning products
Spark data processing of big telco data and prepare them for ML models
Improve code quality and stability through Code Review, setting Code standards etc.
Help data scientists with software engineering practices
Use mostly Python and libraries for Machine Learning (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch, etc.) in Azure
Collaborate with other engineers and data scientists to accelerate our development
Collaborate with Product Managers and teams to deliver compelling Machine Learning products within complex telco environments
Identify and resolve performance and scalability issues
Show profound experience utilizing automation tools to deliver robust AI solutions
Report directly to the AI Centre management
Qualifications:
What is obligatory
Enthusiasm for AI, ML and data science, eagerness to become a true AI engineer
Ability to design, implement and reason about complex systems at scale
5+ years of Coding experience with interpreted and compiled languages, including concepts like Software Design Patterns, Asynchronous programming, Microservices and more
Hands-on experience with CI/CD pipelines automation, deployment, containerization, load balancing and monitoring
Experience with cloud platforms
Profound hands-on experience with TDD
You’re keen to grow in any of the above skills you might be lacking
Both Czech and English in full professional proficiency (you will communicate with non-Czech speakers daily)
What we appreciate
Experience from start-up environment
Ability to understand and use functional programming concepts in practical ways
Experience working with data-oriented or analytics teams
Experience with data warehouses, big data platforms, data science and machine learning-based products
What to expect:
One-month intensive crash course and ML Bootcamp to help you gain AI engineering skills
A mission that goes beyond performance and profit (“AI for good” is our mantra)
Hybrid working mode
Seasoned leaders you can count on
A company culture that helps the team to perform highly and humanly at the same time
Regular bonus pays based on your KPI
Employee benefits (scroll down for details)
We can offer you:
Our most popular benefits include a post to a mobile phone of your choice up to 18 000 CZK or a cafeteria with 18,000 points.
But O2 offers a wide range of benefits, from preferential O2 TV and internet, language courses, meal vouchers, 25 days of leave and 3 sick days.
title: SW Engineer for AI Centre (m/f)

text:
This role is responsible for Dataclair AI solutions. We're looking for candidates with experience in developing SW solutions or with experience in the data engineering domain who want to move further – towards building machine learning products and designing data science solutions.

We call it a transformative position as we give you an opportunity to bring your current SW development or data engineering skills and knowledge of the best practices to the table, and at the same time, to become native in machine learning and data science.
In your daily work, you will:
Crack challenging problems of how to develop, productionalize and deploy machine learning models over messy telco big data
Design efficient and reusable modules/systems/pipelines that drive complex Machine Learning products
Spark data processing of big telco data and prepare them for ML models
Improve code quality and stability through Code Review, setting Code standards etc.
Help data scientists with software and data engineering practices
Use mostly Python and libraries for Machine Learning (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch, etc.) in Azure
Collaborate with other engineers and data scientists to accelerate our development
Collaborate with Product Managers and teams to deliver compelling Machine Learning products within complex telco environments
Identify and resolve performance and scalability issues
Show profound experience utilizing automation tools to deliver robust AI solutions
Report directly to the AI Center management
Qualifications:
What is obligatory
Enthusiasm for AI, ML and data science, eagerness to become a true AI engineer
Ability to design, implement and reason about complex systems at scale
You’re keen to grow in any of the above skills you might be lacking
Both Czech and English in full professional proficiency (you will communicate with non-Czech speakers daily)
What we appreciate
Experience from start-up environment
Experience with CI/CD pipelines automation, deployment, containerization, load balancing and monitoring
Experience with cloud platforms
Ability to understand and use functional programming concepts in practical ways
Experience working with data-oriented or analytics teams
Experience with data warehouses, big data platforms, data science and machine learning-based products
What to expect:
A mission that goes beyond performance and profit (“AI for good” is our mantra)
Hybrid working mode
Seasoned leaders you can count on
A company culture that helps the team to perform highly and humanly at the same time
Regular bonus pays based on your KPI
Employee benefits (scroll down for details)
We can offer you:
Our most popular benefits include a post to a mobile phone of your choice up to 18 000 CZK or a cafeteria with 18,000 points.
But O2 offers a wide range of benefits, from preferential O2 TV and internet, language courses, meal vouchers, 25 days of leave and 3 sick days.
title: Data Engineer for AI Center (m/f)

text: For us, SOC is not just logging or monitoring but it is a comprehensive threat management tool of which logging is only one component. Our understanding of SOC includes Monitoring and Incident Detection, Investigating Incidents and their remediation and also support services such as Vulnerability Management and Threat Intelligence, technologically and from the perspective of terms of all related processes. We deliver service to client which consists of analysis of events in Security Information and Event Management (SIEM) system and response to security incidents and we provide additional expertise (Vulnerability management, … ) when demanded. Marek is Head of Cyber Operations with over 8 years of experience with cyber security and consulting, building relationships across various teams on local and international level. His experience is coming from multiple international corporations where we are running SOCs, doing SOC transformations, assessments and incident response activities. He considers himself as a self-driven person with a high focus on technical capability and building opportunities based on trust with all stakeholders. He is focused on finding the evil in the enterprise networks and automation. In his free time he likes travelling, spending time with friends, good food and watching movies. For our client facing SOC team we seek a colleague with information security background. Purpose of the position is to help client responding to current threat vectors. Security Operations Center L1 analyst is the first level of monitoring in the SOC. Role combines reviewing of events in SIEM, escalating incidents based on scenarios, reporting based on current needs. We seek someone with passion and desire to live in Information Security field, who wants to grow in a global and challenging environment. PwC is the largest audit team in the Czech Republic, law, tax, consulting and technology, data or forensic teams. Find out how easy it is to combine this knowledge when you're in the right place. With us, you will get the opportunity to see how business is done in large companies. We are part of an international network of companies with more than 327,000 colleagues in 155 countries. Once you've applied for a position, our recruiter for the Risk Assurance team will contact you . You'll then have an interview/selection process. If you're successful and you also get along with the hiring manager, you're good to go and start your career! About the Team About the Manager Job description & summary Requirement of the role What we are offering Basic Cyber Security awareness. General understanding of common threat vectors on the internet. Basic knowledge of operating systems (Windows, Linux, Unix...) Advanced knowledge of Microsoft Office suite. Professional working level on English. 1+ years of information security practice or technical or administrative experience. University degree focused on IT or Cyber Security. Information security background with hands-on experience. Expertise in any of the following areas: Security, Networking, Windows or Linux hands-on experience. Concentrated experience and rapid career growth. It may sound like a platitude, but it really is. Fair wages plus paid overtime and annual bonus. Paid time off 20 + 5 days, 3 sick days and 2 extra days off from the company at the end of the year. High-end Ultrabook and iPhone with unlimited data. Benefit program with 30.000 points that you can use for holidays, education, food vouchers, sports (Multisport), health... Simply on what you enjoy. Support for your education and development: business and digital trainings, technical certifications (e.g. SANS) or whatever that makes sense and it's related to your job etc.. Possibility of Secondments - opportunity to work at a foreign PwC office in the future - for example in the USA, Canada etc.. Extra-work activities and Away Days (team building, ski weekend, etc..) Regular feedback on your work, also consultation with a coach with whom you can address your further development and career direction. Nic to have:
title: Junior Security Operations Center Analyst

text:
What You'll Do
Does selling IoT sound exciting for you? Would you like to be the part of the top solution sales team at the world’s leading IoT connectivity and technology provider? As an Internet of Things Sales Manager, you will be a critical member of the Vodafone sales team, selling IoT products and solutions to our customers. You will work closely with the team of account managers, channel partners, product and marketing specialists to drive our strategy and deliver results.
What knowledge and skills do we expect?
minimum Bachelor‘s degree in technology, business management, or a related discipline with at least 5+ years of proven track record in key account management, and consultative selling principles and/or technical project management in a fast paced technology industry
optimistic and winning attitude, outcome-driven mindset with high level of responsibility and sense of ownership
ability to understand Technology/Software & connectivity domains, IoT, big data analytics and value-adding services
ability to understand & perform in complex sales cycles and project ecosystems
stellar history of quota achievement and strong experience presenting solutions and services to accounts
And we offer you
Here, we address each other informally and aren’t really bothered about a dress code… It suits us all just fine, and we hope you’ll feel good among us too.
Let’s not hide the fact that Vodafone is a big name – so we’re offering you the stable environment of our company, which is simultaneously a challenger on the telecommunications and data market.
We keep up with the times or even a step ahead, so with us you can enjoy 5 weeks of vacation, 5 personal days and optional home office… We also think about parents, with longer vacations for new dads and the option of returning to work sooner under exceptional conditions for moms.
If Vodafone, then full on – you will get a mobile phone and a great tariff with unlimited data, plus 24,000 benefit points per year which you can use in the cafeteria to buy vacations, educational courses or just to invite your dearest to the cinema.
We’re located on a metro line – right at the entrance actually – our headquarters are in Stodůlky. You’ll find everything you need in the building and the vicinity for your lunch break or coffee break, and you can even shop in the nearby stores.
And if you need to shake it off after work, you can grab one of the bikes we rent, or go to our gym located in the building.
Look at an example of what we do..

text:
Procurement Regional Analyst
Enterprise Business Solutions (EBS) is a high-performing, top-quartile, multifunctional, globally diverse team that drives E2E standardized, customer-obsessed, and digitally-enabled solutions to power Kenvue, part of the Johnson & Johnson Family of Companies. We prioritize efficiency, effectiveness, and enhanced experience to create limitless value and ensure everyone can realize the extraordinary power of everyday care. EBS supports the functional Procurement organization in Sourcing through Payments. The Procurement Regional Analyst will have responsibilities to stand up service delivery for Source to Pay, then transition into the steady state operation.
What will you do?
The Procurement Regional Analyst is initially responsible to support standing up of Enterprise Business Solutions for regional Source to Pay with fit for purpose region solutions to ensure legal and compliance requirements. Working within and across other regional centers, this individual will execute transition activities to form EBS Procurement. This role will transition to a Procurement analyst role in the regional Source to Pay operations.
Key Responsibilities:
Support the development and standing up of the fit for purpose the regional Source to Pay operations in line with global requirements, including transformational procurement technology programs.
Operational Source to Pay responsibilities to ensure a seamless experience for the requestor/business partner, evaluating opportunities for continued improvement. The scope includes:
Execute sourcing events, valuate results, communicate with suppliers on quotes, manage negotiations withing EBS thresholds.
Execute contracting requirements where necessary, aligned to sourcing and contracting strategies. Manage contracts from creation, review and approval, finalization, and further contract amendments to price and scope.
Manage the purchase order process, including creating and approving the purchase requisition, verifying budget alignment, and confirming delivery of orders.
Assess change needs, impacts, and stakeholder management activities and support change management integration activities.
Address supplier related inquires related to the transacting of POs, physical processing of invoices, wire transfer requests, and supplier master data.
Track and monitor the deliveries of goods and services.
Ensure upstream and downstream systems are updated as required.
Compliance responsibilities:
Monitor processes for potential risk and compliance concerns, escalating issues unable to be resolved within the team.
Ensure compliance to the defined processes when engaging with the various end users (requestor, business partner, suppliers, fellow associates).
Perform data analysis:
Analyze, and resolve supplier inquiries, disputes, and payment discrepancies
Complete other analyses as needed
Support category strategy execution by:
Executing category priorities withing the scope of EBS for turnaround times, payment channel compliance, supplier optimization, and improvement of digital content of suppliers with recurring spend
Determining and committing to EBS driven category savings
What we are looking for:
Required Qualifications
A minimum of a Bachelor’s degree is required; a concentration in Business, Finance, Accounting, Logistics, Engineering, or related field is preferred
Four (4) years of relevant work experience
Fluency in English required, confidence in presenting to Senior Management in English
Proficiency in Microsoft Office
Demonstrated experience problem solving and dealing with ambiguity
Desired Qualifications
Prior experience in a shared services environment is preferred
Prior experience relationship building or customer service is preferred
Knowledge of Procurement processes (Requisitioning, PO, Invoicing) is preferred
Working knowledge of Procurement systems (ERP, SAP, etc.) is preferred
Effective communication skills and the ability to interact with multiple teams and levels across the Organization
What’s in it for you:
Competitive Benefit Package
Paid Company Holidays, Paid Vacation, Volunteer Time, Summer Fridays & More!
Learning & Development Opportunities
Employee Resource Groups
title: Procurement Regional Associate

text:
What will you do?
The Sourcing Analyst is responsible for supporting the development and execution of category practices for selected categories, including support of sourcing strategy definition, sourcing project execution and stakeholder alignment with strong category focus the Sourcing analyst drives and supports the execution of the sourcing projects and is the point of interaction between the Category Managers and the procurement operations team and supply chain.
Key Responsibilities:
Aligns with stakeholders
Supports the Category Managers with the identification of stakeholders, the initiation of the strategy development as well as execution of sourcing projects
Actively engages with stakeholders as defined in alignment with the Category Managers throughout the strategy development and sourcing execution process
Ensures that the input from the stakeholders is considered in the process
Prepares the stage gate documentation
Supports sourcing
Supports the Category Managers in the analysis and definition of the category spend baseline and category profile, incl. risk assessment and SRM strategy
Supports development of Go-To-Market and negotiation strategies in alignment with the Category Managers and ensures proper documentation
Provides support during the supplier screening and supplier selection process
Assists in the development of Rfx
Supports preparation of supplier communication packages
Prepares fact-based negotiation packages
Supports preparation of implementation plan
Performs sourcing management

title: Sourcing Analyst

text:
The Enterprise Business Solutions function is recruiting for a Global Process Owner (GPO), Sourcing to Contracting position located in Czech, Prague. The position will be responsible for shaping, implementing and continuously refining a frictionless employee/customer experience supported by end to end (E2E) processes. As the GPO, the role will operate in a matrix organization and will be responsible for leading functional and cross functional activities to drive improved process and business performance in support of the E2E Process and improvement strategies. This role reports to the Procurement operational lead.
The scope of responsibilities includes:
Leadership of a global team to drive employee experience supported by E2E processes
Leads the overall content governance process and is responsible to drive Category and EBS leadership alignment on content changes and execute content enhancements. Proactively works with Category leads and Sourcing leads to ensure internal and external content needs are driven in the governance meeting. Identifies the gaps related to Content quality and new content opportunities and drives gap closure plan with business, regional procurement and EBS Procurement operations.
Develops and delivers the External Content Enablement Strategy and framework for a robust Source-to-Settle and Spend Management process. Ensures a robust framework, capabilities, tools and continuous monitoring of operational and commercial performance of external partners needed to enable business content owners to drive their strategies, and ensure robust, seamless Source to Settle and Spend Management processes.
Responsible for the seamless integration of a robust external content enablement design as part of the end to end Source to Settle process design, specifically ensuring the Sourcing design, processes and integrations are in place
Lead the development and implementation of E2E processes across the Procurement function while improving the employee and Supplier user experience
Lead continuous process improvement efforts and partner with EBS and Procurement leaders to ensure compliance with Corporate Services and Global Services Procurement standards
Lead analysis of experience and process performance (cost, speed, quality) to provide qualitative assessments used by Procurement leadership for demonstrating value as well as strategic planning and investments
Leverage employee/customer/data insights to drive prioritized service, process and technology solutions to further enhance service delivery, globally
Promote and support a culture of process improvement, innovation & transformation with BU Procurement partners, GS partners and stakeholders
Drive team engagement and develop a strong pipeline of global, diverse leaders within the experience and process team
Enable a Credo-based & High-Performance Culture within team
Coordinating and synchronizing efforts of regional delivery and Service Excellence and Experience teams to ensure operational standards (inclusive of Managing for Daily Improvement and Continuous Improvement methodologies) are consistently deployed to drive a consistent employee/customer experience that is both effective and efficient
Ensuring process and operations are conducted in a compliant manner, via continuous alignment and execution of the Internal Controls framework.
Requirements
Bachelor's degree (BA/BS) in Procurement, Finance or Supply Chain
Minimum 8 -10 years of related experience in Source to Contract, process improvement, automation. And Minimum 2+ years of people management experience
Strong level of experience and knowledge specific to the supported E2E Process, project management, and a strong track record performance
Strong logical thinking skills, knowledge of process and system improvement, and compliance controls.
Proficient in Microsoft office suite. Detailed oriented and structured in the approach to work
Strong communication, data analytics, and problem-solving skills. Ability to challenge and influence others
Potentially up to 25% travel
Preferred:
Effective and strong partnership and relationship building skills with key stakeholders
Experience in workshop design and facilitation of stakeholders in collaborative problem solving
Analytical and strategic thinker, and highly developed problem-solving skills .
Ability to analyze complex data to draw supportable conclusions and recommendations
Ability to work effectively in a fast-paced environment, handle multiple projects, and daily planned and unplanned operational activities
Strong presentation skills; can speak across various forums and communicate to broad, diverse audience
title: Source to Contract, Global Process Owner

text:
Resulmatic is a cutting-edge IT company specializing in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning solutions. We pride ourselves on our innovative and collaborative culture, where our teams are organized into self-sufficient delivery squads that work independently within a tribe structure. Our goal is to push the boundaries of technology while ensuring a positive and productive work environment for our employees.
At Resulmatic, we are committed to providing powerful AI-based solutions to businesses, enabling them to streamline their processes, reduce costs, and improve decision-making.

Job Description:

We are seeking a skilled and passionate Machine Learning (ML) Data Engineer to join our growing team. As an ML Data Engineer, you will play a key role in ensuring the quality of data within our processes, building and maintaining our Databricks Feature Store, and collaborating with data scientists to create a seamless data-driven environment for our projects. You will also be responsible for educating others on the functionality, values, and advantages of our data systems and tools.

Key Responsibilities:
Ensure the quality of data used within our processes by implementing data validation and cleaning techniques
Build and maintain a complete Databricks Feature Store, utilizing its full capacity to support our AI and ML projects
Educate colleagues on the functionality, values, and advantages of the Databricks Feature Store
Integrate basic datasets into the feature store for use across various projects
Equip data scientists with the ability to add new features to the feature store and support their data needs
Find ways to implement complex functions into easily accessible features within the feature store
Monitor feature stores, including feature usage, value, and organization into proper domains
Set up alerts to notify the team of any issues or problems
Stay on top of technical advancements in ML field (company time to enhance your skills)

Qualifications:
Excellent understanding of Python (pyspark, pandas, scikit-learn, ..)
Knowledge of Machine Learning processes and techniques
Experience with Databricks and Spark is a great advantage
Self-driven and knowledge-hungry professional with commitment to personal growth
Proven experience in data engineering, data validation, and data management
Strong communication and collaboration skills
Professional working proficiency in Czech/Slovak + English
What We Offer:
Competitive salary and benefits package
IČO contract for an indefinite period or employement contract
5 weeks of paid holidays, with 1 extra day for each year of cooperation
Opportunity to work with cutting-edge technologies in the AI and Machine Learning industry
A supportive and growth-oriented work environment
Professional development in the form of internal and external training
The chance to make a meaningful impact on the future of technology
Join our team and be a part of an exciting and innovative company that values collaboration, creativity, and the pursuit of excellence.
Apply now and help shape the future of AI and Machine Learning with Resulmatic.

text:
We are looking for a colleague (junior or senior) who will strengthen our team of Financial Accounting Advisory Services. Our FAAS professionals are key business advisors to the CFOs, Controllers, and Treasurers of companies.

As part of our team, you will assist our clients to address the finance agenda, especially its corporate treasury part, and related challenges facing their business.
We provide advisory services encompassing:
Financial accounting advisory services including audit performance, controlling and reporting management
Corporate treasury services, including organizational and operations decision supports, centralization activities, and support with the digitalization of processes
And as FAAS in general:
Finance function strategic transformation
Accounting, reporting, and controlling process design and information systems implementation
Finance process optimization and automation incl. Robotics Process Automation
Data analytics and visualization
Accounting and regulatory support on accounting change in IFRS (IFRS conversion and implementation, new standards implementation) and Czech Accounting Legislation
Financial consolidation
Transaction accounting
Short-term assignments to finance functions – accounting specialist, compliance specialist, consolidation specialist, controller, etc.
Audit readiness and audit remediation
Your job responsibilities:
You will collaborate in the delivery and management of FAAS projects, both during on-site as well as off-site client support and you will report to the project manager
During the projects you be part of small teams of junior and senior consultants and cooperate with other EY service lines communicate to client’s management personnel
You will cooperate and exchange experience with other colleagues in the EMEIA region
You will be developing your own skills and experience with new technologies as well as making sure that you share your know-how with more junior consultants
You will apply all analytical, technical, and interpersonal skills
Our requirements:
Knowledge and min. 2 years of working experience in corporate finance management or controlling department
Advanced knowledge of MS Office (MS Excel, MS Word, MS PowerPoint, MS Access)
Excellent communication skills both in Czech/Slovak and English
Willingness to operate in a variety of sectors
Willingness to work with new technologies
Analytical mindset and critical thinking
Strong written and verbal communication and presentation skills
Basic project management skills
Willingness for occasional traveling
What would be an advantage / nice to have:
Experience with corporate treasury agenda and functions
Experience with any treasury technology including Treasury Management System(s)
Experience in financial risks exposure management and accounting
Experience with finance transformation (e.g. in or out-sourcing or process optimization) or financial systems implementation projects (e.g. SAP implementation)
Ability to identify business opportunities – entrepreneurial approach to business, commercially and strategically driven
Experience with financial reporting or controlling
PRINCE 2 or Scrum certification
Awareness or basic experience with programming languages (SQL, Python…)
Awareness or basic experience with RPA technologies
What we offer:
Time off: 6 weeks off and one extra EY Day to recharge your batteries.
Reward for recommending a candidate: Earn from 10 to 70 thousand CZK for referring a new colleague.
Benefit points: 27 000 in Cafeteria for you to spend as you wish. For example, get a Multisport card, buy gifts or enjoy a holiday on Slevomat.
Professional development: With us you are constantly learning and developing your skills. We offer you a unique professional development programme and a wide range of courses in our learning map. You can enjoy access to the Udemy.com learning portal and language courses. Our colleagues will support you with counselling and internal coaching.
iPhone 13 and for private use.
Employee discounts: Enjoy great discounted offers on a wide range of services. Take advantage of discounts at Fruitisimo, Sushi Time, Opticians, BodyBody fitness centre and more.
Health and care: Get access to fast and convenient online advice at uLékaře.cz from qualified doctors. Plus, we'll pay for your life insurance.
Teamwork and fun: We are not just about work, but also about fun and teamwork. Not only after successfully completing big projects, you'll be rewarded with dinners, bowling, company parties and other great events that enhance our team atmosphere. You can also get involved in CSR activities.
title: Consultant - Finance & Treasury

text:
Peace, boredom, minimal contact with the colleagues, repetitive routine activities, and clear assignments? Well, you won't find exactly that here. If you want to do something different every day, communicate with different types of users, work with different technologies and have your own tasks from the beginning of your career at VIG Re, with your responsibility and a lot of work, then this is what we can offer you. In return, we try to develop both at internal trainings and especially at external trainings in the Czech Republic and abroad.
As a BI Developer, you will be a part of our IT Department responsible for designing and creating new and innovative solutions that will help our company deliver required results, improving data quality, and advancing many other areas that are supported by IT solutions.
Your responsibilities
Development and maintenance of data warehouse and reporting based on MS SQL Server & Power BI
Participation on requirements gathering, analysis of End User Requirements and the impact analysis on a technical solution
Design conceptual and logical data models and flowcharts and ensuring long-term sustainable development
Sorting out of data and technological problems
Implementation of Data Governance in VIG Re
Our expectations
University education preferably in IT area, and at least five years of relevant experience
Knowledge of SQL and experience with MS SQL Server
Analytical skills
English – intermediate
Active and innovative approach
Responsibility, reliability, and flexibility
What we offer
Full time job with flexible working hours
Start of cooperation – as soon as possible
Work in an international team
A position in one of the top insurance groups in Central and Eastern Europe
Personal development and education
Working in Prague city center
title: BI Developer

text:
Charakteristika pozice
Zažít nezapomenutelný rok v největším českém pivovaru? To chceš!
Nejen, že budeš mít na starosti svůj projekt, který může společnost posunout dál, ale navíc získáš cenné zkušenosti, které jen tak nezapomeneš!
U nás se nemusíš bát, že by Tvoje názory nebyly slyšet. V Prazdroji si ceníme každého dobrého nápadu! Na konci svůj projekt odprezentuješ nejvyššímu vedení Plzeňského Prazdroje a po úspěšném ukončení stáže se můžeš těšit i na finanční bonus.

O čem bude Tvůj projekt?
Tvým úkolem bude provést analýzu toku materiálů, kterou následně vyhodnotíš a na základě výsledků navrhneš změny manipulační techniky, oblužnosti výrobních linek a možné zefektivnění procesu ve skladech pivovaru Radegast Nošovice. Nějaké nápady už máme, ale uvítáme, když nám je pomůžeš posoudit a upgradovat! Zní to složitě? Neboj, zkušení kolegové Tě v tom rozhodně nenechají!

Co by Ti nemělo chybět:
Studuješ 3. – 5. ročník vysoké školy
Mluvíš dobře anglicky a umíš prezentovat i jinak než česky/slovensky
Baví Tě řešit problémy a chceš za sebou mít dobře odvedenou práci
Jsi schopný/á analyticky myslet, jasně interpretovat data získaná z různých zdrojů a vidět v nich vzájemné souvislosti
Máš týmového ducha, ale současně umíš přebrat zodpovědnost za své úkoly

Co nabízí Prazdroj:
Příležitost nabrat zkušenosti v jedničce na českém trhu
Samostatný a reálný projekt, kde můžeš ukázat, co v Tobě je!
Příležitost a podporu v osobním i profesním růstu a rozvoji
Spolupráci s firmou, která respektuje své zaměstnance i okolí. Udržitelnost je přirozenou součástí našeho podnikání i firemní strategie.
Práci pestrou jako portfolio našich nápojů
Brigádu, kde můžeš být sám/sama sebou. U nás do kanclu v kvádru/lodičkách chodit nemusíš!
Zaměstnavatele, kterým se můžeš chlubit (nejen) v hospodě

Lokalita: ČR

Charakteristika pozice
Zažít nezapomenutelný rok v největším českém pivovaru? To chceš!
Nejen, že budeš mít na starosti svůj projekt, který může společnost posunout dál, ale navíc získáš cenné zkušenosti, které jen tak nezapomeneš!

O čem bude Tvůj projekt?

Hospody a restaurace jsou pro Prazdroj svatým grálem už více než 180 let, proto jim pomáháme a snažíme se je rozvíjet po všech stránkách. Pro tyto účely nabízíme majitelům hospod a restaurací spoustu úspěšných rozvojových programů a hledáme člověka, který nám pomůže tyto programy integrovat do našich interních systémů. Tvým úkolem bude vymyslet a zajistit, aby se nám s nástroji pracovalo snadno a efektivně. V rámci stáže budeš také hojně komunikovat s kolegy, díky čemuž poznáš spoustu nových lidí – od kolegů z obchodu, přes IT až po samotné zákazníky.

text: Ředitel ICS vyhlašuje výběrové řízení na pozici  . Jsme   a zajišťujeme primárně provoz a rozvoj IT infrastruktury Masarykovy univerzity. Naše služby nabízíme více než 6500 zaměstnancům a 31000 studentům, zároveň pracujeme na vlastním špičkovém výzkumu, pomáháme s výzkumnými daty a rozsáhlými výpočty v různých vědních oborech. Aktuálně hledáme posilu do nově vzniklého týmu  , který sídlí při výzkumném centru CERIT-SC. Sekretariát EOSC-CZ funguje jako národní kontaktní místo pro budování české implementace společného výzkumného prostoru European Open Science Cloud (EOSC) neboli prostředí pro pokročilou správu výzkumných dat. Očekávánou změnou, kterou by implementace EOSCu v ČR měla zajistit, je kvalitativní změna práce s vědeckými výsledky (zejména daty) v akademickém a výzkumném prostředí u nás. Tato změna nahlíží na data jako na klíčový výsledek vědecké práce a na nově budovanou infrastrukturu jako na nástroj, jak posunout dále vědu v 21. století v oblasti použití digitálních technologií. - přípravě a realizaci komunikační strategie v rámci implementace EOSCu v ČR pro účely implementace EOSCu v ČR dle schválené národní architektury. - přípravě vizuálních prvků a správě marketingových kanálů jak pro vnitřní, tak vnější komunikaci. - přípravě a realizaci souvisejících akcí a partnerských spoluprací. - hodnocení komunikačních potřeb a bariér na různých úrovních a dle různých cílových skupin. - rozvoji spolupráce se specialisty na národní i mezinárodní úrovní s cílem nastavit vhodnou komunikaci vůči různým stakeholderům, zájmovým a policy skupinám. - zajištění běžného provozu národního portálu EOSC v ČR (www.eosc.cz). - má prokazatelné zkušenosti s tím, jak marketingovou strategii nejen nastavit, ale i realizovat a měřit. - má zkušenosti se sociálními sítěmi a event managementem, které považuje za strategické nástroje dosažení zamýšlené změny. - má schopnost dlouhodobě budovat vztahy a důvěru v rámci vědecké komunity a s médii. je schopen komunikace v angličtině (min. požadovaná úroveň B2 ERR). - se nebojí zkoušet nové cesty a způsoby, jak dosahovat stanovených cílů. - máte předchozí zkušenost s prací ve vědeckém prostředí, vysokoškolské vzdělání není podmínkou. - máte zájem, nebo dokonce zkušenosti se správou výzkumných dat. - vám neschází zájem o popularizaci vědy. - rozumíte problematice řízení vztahů se zákazníky (CRM). - máte zkušenosti s vědeckou diplomacií na jakékoliv úrovni. - práci na plný úvazek (FTE 1.0) v zázemí renomovaného univerzitního pracoviště, - přátelský kolektiv, kde nejen sdílíme své know-how, ale rádi trávíme čas i v rámci teambuildingových akcí, - možnost z Brna se podílet na budování národního řešení pro českou vědu, - příležitosti cestovat a navštěvovat partnerské organizace a odborné akce, - flexibilní pracovní dobu a možnost částečného home-office, - další benefity pro zaměstnance Masarykovy univerzity, jako je 6 týdnů dovolené, Multisport karta, řadu příspěvků (na stravu, očkování atd.), bezplatné parkování u areálu pracoviště, zvýhodněná Multisport karta (i pro rodinné příslušníky), možnost využití univerzitního psychologického poradenství, zvýhodněné mobilní tarify, zvýhodněné bankovní produkty, příspěvek na stravování, příspěvek na penzijní připojištění, slevu do univerzitního kina nebo na jazykové vzdělávání a další.  Ústav výpočetní techniky MUNI, Šumavská 416/15, Brno. Zaujala Vás možnost pracovat na změně vědeckého prostředí pro českou vědu? Tak se neváhejte přihlásit do výběrového řízení zasláním svého životopisu při vyplnění e-přihlášky níže. Na ICS MUNI prosazujeme rovný přístup, šanci získat zaměstnání má každý/á uchazeč/ka bez ohledu na věk, pohlaví, sociální či jiné znevýhodnění. I díky těmto principům je ÚVT MU držitelem ocenění HR Excellence in Research Award, které uděluje Evropská komise.  přihlášky budou vyhodnocovány průběžně  dle domluvy  plný úvazek  od poloviny června 2023 Specialista/specialistka komunikace EOSC-CZ Institute of Computer Science – ICS Sekretariátu EOSC-CZ S námi budete pracovat na: Hledáme člověka, který: Výhodou je, pokud: My Vám nabízíme: Místo výkonu práce: Informace o průběhu výběrového řízení:  Uzávěrka přihlášek: Předpokládaný nástup: Úvazek: Pohovory:

text: Máš povědomí o nepřímých daních? Chceš získat pracovní zkušenosti s týmem profíků v prostředí prestižní mezinárodní společnosti? Pokud ano, tak bychom si mohli plácnout. Provedeme Tě světem daní, kde na Tebe čekají první klienti, projekty a zkušenosti seniorních kolegů. Nehledáme jen kolegu, ale také týmového hráče. Je nás okolo dvaceti a jsme pestrý tým seniorních a juniorních lidí. Jsou mezi námi rodiče malých dětí, studenti i mladí lidé pár let po škole. Manažeři v našem týmu se specializují na nejrůznější průmyslová odvětví – výrobní sektor, farmaceutické společnosti, finanční instituce, podnikání v nemovitostech a další. Umíme DPH, spotřební daně, cla i energetické daně. PwC, to je největší auditní tým v České republice, a také poradenské týmy, které se zaměřují na daňové poradenství, strategie, fúze & akvizice, restrukturalizace, finanční poradenství, právo, technologie, data nebo forenzní analýzu. Zjisti, jak snadné je kombinovat tyto znalosti, když jsi na správném místě. Těšíme se na Tvůj strukturovaný životopis a doufáme, že se společně potkáme na výběrovém řízení. A pokud se vše povede, tak se na Tebe budeme těšit a společně rozjedeme Tvou kariéru v PwC! Jaká bude tvoje role v týmu: Jaké znalosti a dovednosti očekáváme? Co u nás získáš: Během prvního roku v PwC projdeš intenzivním tréninkem a začneš studovat Tax Academy, kde porozumíš základním principům a aktuálním postupům v oblasti české i mezinárodní daňové praxe. Zapojíš se do projektů v oblasti daně z přidané hodnoty, celních záležitostí, spotřebních či ekologických daní. Budeš spolupracovat s kolegy z dalších kanceláří PwC na regionálních a globálních projektech i v rámci lokálních PwC týmů. Angličtinu budeš používat velmi často, a proto Ti pomůžeme se v ní zdokonalit za pomoci týmových lekcí. Budeš se moci zúčastnit Data Analytics Online Academy, která Tě provede technology základy, na které navážeš s naším daňovým technology týmem. Baví tě moderní technologie? U nás dostaneš možnost podílet se na modernizaci a zlepšování běžných daňových procesů prostřednictvím těch nejmodernějších nástrojů, např. Alteryx, Power BI, Qlik. Pokud tě baví publikační činnost, můžeš tvořit daňový obsah pro naši mobilní daňovou aplikaci a blog, či post na LinkedIn. Ukončené magisterské studium ideálně daňového, nebo jiného ekonomického oboru. Zkušenost s daňovým poradenstvím je vítána, ale není podmínkou. Perfektní znalost češtiny, angličtinu na úrovni B2 nebo lépe. Němčina je výhodou – nikoli podmínkou! Smysl pro zodpovědnost a vědomí, že se na Tebe můžeme spolehnout. Placené volno 30 dní, 3 sick days a 1 den vánočního volna navíc. Zkoušky daňového poradce: Nabízíme studijní program na míru od Komory daňových poradců, který zahrnuje přípravné kurzy od komisařů, studijní volno, cestovné do Brna a odbornou literaturu pro naše studenty. Za úspěšné složení Tě čeká skvělá motivační odměna. Benefit program s 30 000 body, který můžeš využít na cestování, vzdělávání, stravenky, sport (Multisportka), zdraví, nebo lítačku… Prostě na to, co tě baví. Špičkový Ultrabook a iPhone 13 s neomezenými daty. Systematický profesní a osobní rozvoj, jako třeba lokální i mezinárodní Tax Academy a mnoho dalších. Mimopracovní aktivity a Away Days (team building, ski weekend apod.). Od prvního dne na to nebudeš sám, čeká Tě propracovaný systém adaptace, kde Ti bude k ruce Buddy a zkušený karierní Kouč.

title: Senior úvěrový analytik (m/ž) – Global Banking

text:
Resulmatic is a cutting-edge IT company specializing in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning solutions. We pride ourselves on our innovative and collaborative culture, where our teams are organized into self-sufficient delivery squads that work independently within a tribe structure. Our goal is to push the boundaries of technology while ensuring a positive and productive work environment for our employees.
At Resulmatic, we are committed to providing powerful AI-based solutions to businesses, enabling them to streamline their processes, reduce costs, and improve decision-making.
Job Description:
We are seeking a skilled Data Scientist to join our Generative AI squad. As a member of our Gen AI research and development team, you will be responsible for preparing end-to-end solutions that have a significant business impact. Often the optimal solution is not easy to find, so you will work together with a team of researchers, engineers, and data scientists to iterate upon and implement innovative solutions and push the boundaries of generative AI. The ideal candidate will have a background in machine learning, deep learning, along with demonstrable experience and knowledge in generative AI projects.

Responsibilities:
* Work closely with cross-functional teams to understand business requirements and translate them into end-to-end generative AI solutions. Design and implement the necessary components to enable the deployment and utilization of these solutions
* Identify opportunities for using AI techniques to solve critical business challenges
* Propose development plans of ML and AI projects
* Stay on top of technical advancements in the generative AI field, with company time to further enhance your skills
* Advise others about best practices of AI and LLM development
* Use all available tools and features we have at our disposal
Qualifications:
* Proven experience in Deep Learning algorithms & their application to complex problems
* Interest in progress and inner workings of Generative AI
* Proficiency in Python deep learning frameworks, such as TensorFlow, PyTorch or JAX
* Experience with LLM frameworks, such as langchain, is a plus
* Knowledge and understanding of large language models and embeddings is a plus
* Problem-solving mindset with an ability to approach complex research problems from a creative and innovative standpoint

* Experience in Databricks and Azure cloud is a plus
* Very strong analytical and critical thinking skills, team spirit and communication skills
* Self-driven and knowledge-hungry professional with commitment to continuous personal growth
What We Offer:
* Competitive salary and benefits package

* IČO contract for an indefinite period

* 5 weeks of paid holidays, with 1 extra day for each year of cooperation

* Opportunity to work with cutting-edge technologies in the Generative AI industry

* A supportive and growth-oriented work environment

* Professional development in the form of internal and external training

* The chance to make a meaningful impact on the future of technology

* Join our team and be a part of an exciting and innovative company that values collaboration, creativity, and the pursuit of excellence.

* Apply now and help shape the future of AI and Machine Learning with Resulmatic.
title: Data Scientist – Generative AI

text:
Do týmu ostřílených odborníků na finanční nástroje hledáme posilu na pozici konzultanta. Pojďte s námi pracovat na zakázkách pro finanční instituce, včetně bank a investičních fondů, ale rovněž pro klienty z komerčních sektorů, jako jsou nemovitosti, doprava, strojírenství či energetika, na projektech týkajících se oceňování, účetnictví a řízení rizik finančních nástrojů.

analýza finančních nástrojů, s nimi souvisejících obchodních případů a jejich účetního zachycení
oceňování finančních nástrojů všech typů, od dluhopisů po finanční deriváty
samostatná práce na projektech v oblasti řízení finančních rizik a zajišťovacího účetnictví
pomoc na rozsáhlejších projektech celého oddělení Risk Consulting, jako je metodické poradenství v oblasti regulatorního reportingu bank, vývoj automatizačních nástrojů pro reporting či řízení rizik, Due Dilligence a restrukturalizační projekty ve finančním sektoru
objevování nových trendů, které teprve začnou hýbat trhem
Co očekáváme od vás
VŠ nejlépe ekonomického či matematického směru
zkušenosti ve financích, účetnictví či řízení rizik
základní znalost principů účetnictví a finančních produktů
znalost MS Excel
smysl pro detail, pečlivost a pocit zodpovědnosti za vlastní práci
zájem získávat technické dovednosti v oboru, chuť komunikovat s klienty, prezentovat výsledky práce a třeba i vést menší projektový tým
perfektní češtinu/slovenštinu a angličtinu na komunikativní úrovni

příspěvek 30 000 Kč na sport, kulturu a další benefity
intenzivní rozvoj technických i měkkých dovedností
vzdělávání formou interních i externích školení, v případě doporučení i studium certifikací typu ACCA, FRM a interní koučing

title: Financial Instruments Accounting – Junior konzultant/ka

text:
Náš tým BI reporting hledá fajn kolegu/kolegyni na pozici BUSINESS INTELLIGENCE DEVELOPER pro J&T BANKU. Nejsme typický korporát, spíše rodinná firma. Stavíme na dlouhodobém partnerství. Záleží nám na tom, aby u nás zaměstnanci dlouho vydrželi a rostli společně s bankou.
V našem týmu BI se můžeš profilovat podle svých znalostí a schopností.
CO U NÁS ZÍSKÁŠ:
Naučíš se to specifické prostředí investiční a privátní banky, produkty a s tím související technologie. Budeš spolupracovat s řadou velmi seniorních kolegů, kteří se ti budou věnovat a hodně se toho od nich naučíš.
Možnost podílet se na vývoji a optimalizaci sady reportů ve svěřené oblasti.
Možnost podílet se na vývoji datových tabular modelů pro reporting
Možnost odborně se rozvíjet a růst
NA ČEM BUDEŠ PRACOVAT:
Budeš se podílet na analýze a vývoji reportů finančních a obchodních dat. Konkrétněji budeš mít na starosti:
Analýzu potřeb a požadavků na reporting v oblasti financí
Přípravu dat úvěrových obchodů a následný reporting
Vývoj a provoz reportů (MS Reporting Services a Power BI)
Vytváření databázových objektů v Oracle
V budoucnu vývoj a provoz datových tabular modelů v MS Analysis Services
CO BUDEŠ KE SVÉ PRÁCI POTŘEBOVAT:
Znalost SQL, které máš v malíčku a je tvůj denní chleba
Proaktivnost, zvídavost, pečlivost a otevřenost jsou tvoje přednosti
Jsi týmový hráč, schopný se rychle učit a porozumět reportingové oblasti v J&T BANCE
V reportingu se pohybuješ více jak tři roky a máš s ním zkušenost
Znalost MS Reporting Services, ve kterém jsi už pracoval a orientuješ se v něm
Máš praxi s MS Analysis Services a umíš v něm vytvořit datový model v Tabular modu
Víš, co je Power BI, ve kterém jsi už pár reportů zvládl
Víš, co je DWH, a rozumíš mu
Tvojí výhodou je znalost DAX (function, queries), MDX a PowerShell
Máš orientaci ve financích a bankovnictví (ekonomické vzdělání je výhodou)

text:
The Analyst Loan Review performs the regulatory controls in the entire credit portfolio he is responsible for. He is responsible for the overall analysis and evaluation of asset quality, both qualitatively and quantitatively, and creates reports based on the combined results. In this way, the analyst creates the professional prerequisites for a consistent assessment of asset quality, the derivation and monitoring of the implementation of recommendations for action to the risk, market units or delivery organization as well as the resulting impulses to other participating organizational units.
Your tasks
Carry out the Loan Review sampling testing for Commerzbank`s New York portfolio, including coordination and preparation of the results with the operating units concerned.
Implementation, evaluation and reporting of meaningful top-down analysis to identify anomalies in the portfolio.
Documentation of all analysis and assessment results and derivation of recommendations for action to improve portfolio quality and risk management in close coordination with the units involved, as well as to improve guidelines and instruction management.
Preparation and quality assurance of the presentation of the analysis results as well as preparation and follow-up of the final discussions to the affected units. Participation in the creation of ad-hoc analysis in report form, e.g. in portfolio screenings.
Participation in analysis as part of the validation and further development of the used scoring and rating procedures including AQR sampling rating.
Conception, creation and ongoing further development of an Loan Review reporting for management and segment management.
Your profile
2-5 years of work experience within a financial institution
Solid credit, finance or accounting background
Ability to manage a volume-driven workflow and work quickly
Excellent verbal and written communication skills (English and/ or German), with ability to demonstrate initiative and a proactive approach to risk and data analysis.
Analytical thinking and attention to detail.
Good experience with Microsoft products, especially Excel, Word, PowerPoint. Experience in Access is an advantage
Great team player and willingness to work in an international environment
The company
The newly established Global Credit Center in Prague is designed as a flexible, dynamic, and adaptable addition to the core units of credit risk management.
Our goal is to help risk management to streamline the workflows, increase the work-efficiency, help to comply with regulatory requirements and to enhance data-quality.
title: Asset Analyst Loan Review in Global Credit Center Prague

text:
Notino je v současné době evropskou jedničkou v online prodeji parfémů a kosmetiky, přičemž z našich balíčků se těší lidé již v 27 zemích Evropy. Na tento raketový růst reaguje i naše IT oddělení, a proto nyní hledáme dalšího šikovného „ajťáka“, který by se podílel nejen na tom, abychom aktuální postavení udrželi, ale který by svými schopnostmi a zkušenostmi přispíval k dalšímu růstu a úspěchu Notina.
Pro lepší představu o objemu práce přidáme pár čísel: máme teď cca 2200 zaměstnanců na HPP, z toho cca 350 „ajťáků“, 24 prodejen v EU, 4 distribuční centra a brzy budeme otevírat další.
O nás
Spravujeme přes 3000 koncových zařízení a přes 2000 mobilních zařízení.
Přibližně 70 nových kolegů pak měsíčně nastoupí přímo k nám na centrálu. Práce je tedy hodně a je velmi různorodá.
Společně spolupracujeme na administraci infrastruktury firmy v 35 geograficky oddělených lokalitách (tisíce koncových stanic a virtuálních serverů).
Zabezpečujeme chod všech firemních office, distribučních center a prodejen.
Náš tým se za poslední 5 let rozrostl z 5ti lidí na 20 lidí, kdo by nechtěl být ve třetí desítce?
Jaká bude tvoje náplň práce?
Instalace a konfigurace PC, tenkých klientů, notebooků, tiskových zařízení, kamerových systémů, videokonferenčních zařízení, MDM a Wi-Fi zařízení.
Nebudeš jen IT administrátor, poznáš do hloubky AD, DHCP, DNS, DFS, backup, O365, virtualizační prostředí VMware, monitoring.
Sáhneš si i na analýzu zabezpečení koncových stanic pomocí machine learning.
Budeš se podílet na nasazování nových technologií.
Podíváš se i po našich lokalitách po celé Evropě.
Staneš se oporou našich kolegů přes ticketovací portál.
Evidence veškerého IT vybavení pro lepší správu a přehlednost.
Koho potřebujeme?
Ajťáka, který má rád svou práci stejně jako my a stojí nohama pevně na zemi.
Kolegu, který má prokazatelné zkušenosti se správou IT zařízení.
Osobnost, které vyhovuje svoboda v práci a neformální jednání.
Předpokládáme dobré komunikační schopnosti, které využiješ při poskytování podpory kolegům.
Vyžadujeme proaktivní a samostatný přístup k práci.
Člověka, který má řidičák skupiny B (aktivní řidič).
Někoho, komu není cizí manuální práce.
Toho, který má chuť se vzdělávat a každý den učit něco nového.
A co za to?
Uplatnění svých nápadů a prostor pro vlastní invenci. Nejsme korporát, kde dostaneš úkol a na nic jiného nesmíš sahat.
Profesní růst, naše infrastruktura roste raketovým tempem a tím se zvyšují nároky na zavádění nových technologií a technických řešení. Ty budeš součástí návrhu těchto řešení.
Profesionální tým - budeš se mít od koho učit a nasávat poznatky.
Stabilitu a jasnou vizi firmy.
Ke mzdě potom dostaneš plně hrazené stravenky, 25 dní dovolené a dva sick days. Poskytneme ti všechno technické vybavení, které ke své práci budeš potřebovat, jako je například firemní počítač či telefon s plně hrazenou SIM i k soukromému použití. Pokud jsi sportovec, uvítáš i Multisport kartu. Dále pružnou pracovní dobu, kurzy a školení dle tvých preferencí nebo třeba nákup HW za velkoobchodní ceny. A co bychom to byli za e-shop, kdybychom neposkytovali našim zaměstnancům pěkné slevy na produkty?
Myslíš si, že je to práce pro tebe?
Pošli nám své CVčko nebo místo něj vlož odkaz na Tvůj LinkedIn s kontaktem :-)

text:
Chytrých hlav 💡 není nikdy dost, tak se k nám přidej, abychom mohli společně makat na projektech, které mají smysl a přidanou hodnotu.
Měníme budoucnost, pojď ji s námi budovat i TY!
O čem náš program je?
Staneš se součástí talentového programu Discover, který je určen pro absolventy či studenty vysoké školy hledající full-time job. Co to vlastně znamená? Vodafone je součástí Vodafone Group a ty budeš mít možnost pracovat s kolegy z různých zemí po celém světě, získávat know how, které na českém trhu není a posouvat se na různé pozice.
Navíc o tebe jako o talenta budeme pečovat!
Během prvních 2 let máš možnost poznat minimálně 2 různé pozice, které ti umožní pracovat s kolegy z různých zemí po celém světě, získávat know-how, které na českém trhu není a posouvat se dál. Můžeš se tak vyprofilovat a najít si to pravé!
Co čeká na tebe?
Do našeho General Accounting týmu hledáme novou posilu na pozici Analyst*ka, Finance Operations. Bude se jednat o velmi důležitou a zajímavou roli v mladém a dynamickém kolektivu. V rámci tvojí práce budeš mít zodpovědnost za správné účtování na hlavní knize, za účtování majetku, závazků, cestovních výdajů, intercompany nákladů a dalších účetních případů. Budeš zároveň kontaktním partnerem pro ostatní oddělení v rámci společnosti.
Zodpovědnost za správné účtování včetně závěrkových aktivit
Zodpovědnost za dodržování českých účetních předpisů, IFRS, daňových zákonů a dalších relevantních předpisů a zákonů
Dohled nad dodržováním SOX předpisů, interních směrnic a ostatních nařízení
Aktivní podílení se na globálních i lokálních finančních projektech, spolupráce s globálními týmy
Spolupráce s externími partnery (auditoři, daňoví poradci, dodavatelé apod.)
Spolupráce s interními partnery v rámci celé společnosti (oddělení nákupu, technologické oddělení, ostatní finanční týmy apod.)
Jsi to ty?
Máš alespoň VŠ vzdělání, a to ideálně ekonomického směru (finance, účetnictví)
Mluvíš plynně česky a nebojíš komunikovat v angličtině
Dobře si rozumíš s Excelem (pivotky, V-LOOKUP, SUMIF, aj.)
Analytické myšlení
Proaktivní přístup k práci
Chuť a vůle hledat řešení složitých situací
Dotahování věcí do konce a zodpovědnost
Týmový hráč - s kolegy z týmu budete spolupracovat velmi často
Zájem se dále rozvíjet
Co ti můžeme nabídnout
U nás si zakládáme na příjemné atmosféře, všichni si tykáme a nepotrpíme si úplně na dress code... Všem nám to vyhovuje, takže snad se i ty u nás budeš cítit dobře.
Můžeš očekávat stabilní prostředí společnosti, která je challenger na trhu telekomunikací a dat. Je pro nás i důležité, abys měl*a neustále možnost rozšiřovat své znalosti a dovednosti. Podpoříme každou tvou snahu a růst.
Aktuálně většina z nás pracuje z home office, zvýšený poměr práce z domova si určitě ponecháme i do budoucna.
Jdeme s dobou a vždy jsme o krok dál, díky tomu si u nás užiješ 5 týdnů dovolené, 5 dní osobního volna (dříve sick day).
Myslíme i na rodiče, proto máme pro novopečené rodiče 16 týdnů dovolené a pro maminky možnost se vrátit dříve za jedinečných podmínek.
Když Vodafone, tak naplno - dostaneš mobil a k tomu skvělý tarif s neomezenými daty, přihodíme 24 000 benefitních bodů na rok a můžeš počítat i se stravenkovým paušálem a dalšími výhodami.
Najdeš nás na trase metra, a to dokonce hned u vstupu - sídlíme totiž na Stodůlkách. V budově a okolí najdeš vše potřebné k obědové přestávce, ke kávě, můžeš si zařídit i nákupy v nedalekých obchodech nebo využít náš gym, který máme přímo v budově.
title: Discover Trainee Program - Business Finance Analyst

title: SYSTÉMOVÝ ADMINISTRÁTOR/KA

text: Pracovní nabídka Our company is under the wings of the French BNP Paribas. The star logo is familiar to most people thanks to the sponsorship of the biggest tennis tournaments. And our mission is also stellar – to protect our clients in the event of sudden life events, such as a loss of income due to loss of employment or long-term illness.    In the Czech Republic, we have two divisions – Cardif Pojišťovna and Cardif Services, which primarily focuses on the development of key software for insurance companies within continental Europe. Other services such as development and valuation of insurance products, HR, optimization and unification of processes or management accounting are an integral part.* Insurance business – charging hundreds to be able to pay one to whom something bad happens    What we use? How we work? What we expect? Your daily routine What we offer? Participation on project activities, releases, testing of functionalities Delivering specifications for small changes to target solution that countries require Configuring instance of target solution to suit business needs of country Creating rules for production data transfer between systems Debugging of PROD incidents or other bugs When necessary, coordinate with other projects / new legal requirements / maintenance activities Participation on project activities, releases, testing of functionalities Target solution is a set of two client-server, back-office applications (with some peripherals) bulit mainly with Microsoft technologies (MSSQL, C#, .NET) Confluence as knowledge base Azure DevOps for tracking user stories and issues Enterprise Architect Office 365 suite If it makes sense, we go for it – our methodology is neither Waterfall, nor Agile, but the best from both Roles are defined and respected – as an analyst, you’re not to be merging source code, deploying bug-fixes, preparing test scenarios or programming automated tests, there are developers and testers to do that instead Matrix organization structure – you report to either to project manager or to team leader based on current assignment; there are both project and analytical meetings Entire SDLC is run in-house – there are analytical, development, testing, operations, maintenance, and supporting teams (mix of internal and external employees) As elsewhere, we’ve realized need of documentation just recently, so some system parts are pretty opened to be explored But now we’re focused on all aspects of deliverables – it’s OK to spend longer on tasks if it is because of creating more pieces of documentation Currently communication within the region is done remotely and most likely is going to stay that way Ability to gain knowledge about our system and pass it to countries‘ (business) representatives Asking questions to understand end-user needs Creativity in finding alternative solutions (change current processes to what system already allows) Spoken and written English (B2) and Czech/Slovak Decent technical background (SQL, UML) Support daily run activities and incidents in CEE region (CZ,SK,AT,HU,RO) from our Shared Service Centre in Prague Deliver analysis outputs from assigned project tasks or business requirements from standard business as usual demands or, Cooperation with other teams and participation in other projects, based on current allocation Participation in the whole development cycle in IT Business Analyst role Describe, analyze and validate the company’s business processes to implement change requests for application development Follow given methodology of the development, system integration and implementation of new applications and changes Propose changes in Information Systems in reactive and proactive mode End user support and cooperation with Business Analyst L1 Daily interaction with Developers L3 Analyze the data/data errors and test new features Provide support to testing, development and business users with listed system issues Permanent contract Team of young enthusiasts helping each other Especially, there’s always someone, lead analyst or coordinator or team leader, always at your disposal We’ll build on areas where you’re strong and give you opportunity to grow in others Regular in- and out-of-office activities (birthday parties, „let’s go for a beer“) Flexible working hours What is it about?
title: Medior/Senior IT Business Analyst

text: Přidej se do našeho infrastrukturního týmu jako Windows Administrator – pojď s námi poskytovat komplexní infrastrukturní podporu pro naše klienty z oblasti energetiky. Je to jedinečná příležitost projít z práce na čistém supportu také k implementaci. Našim hlavním cílem je aby aplikace fungovala hladce.     O čem to celé je? Co od Tebe očekáváme? Co nabízíme? text: Náš hlavní stack práce v Zásilkovně je zajistit plynulý chod a rozvoj všech dep, kontrolu jejich stavu a případně hasit náhlé požáry. Depa jsou s technologiemi prakticky spojena. text:

text: Pracovní nabídka To support client's growing activities, we are looking for a motivated professional to join our client as a   with focus on Construction who will strengthen the Czech controlling team focusing on Construction projects budgeting & analysis.!
