text:
At Vodafone, we’re working hard to build a better future. A more connected, inclusive and sustainable world. As a dynamic global community, it's our human spirit, together with technology, that empowers us to achieve this.
We challenge and innovate in order to connect people, businesses, and communities across the world. Delighting our customers and earning their loyalty drive us, and we experiment, learn fast and get it done, together.
With us, you can be truly be yourself and belong, share inspiration, embrace new opportunities, thrive, and make a real difference.
Role function:
Design and delivery of simple, fast and automated tools and processes for customers and customer-facing employees, with a high focus on customer experience.
# Direct reports: up to 30
Key Responsibilities:
Your goals: Simple, fast and automated tools and processes for customers and customer facing employees. Happy and satisfied customers and employees. Customer Care and Sales meet their efficiency and customer satisfaction goals.
Your playground: Chatbot, Robotics, Contact center systems (all on global cloud platforms), Design contribution to all company projects, Customer journey analytics, Process design across company, Voice of customer, Quality monitoring and measurement, Business ownership of billing and crm systems
Your buddies for example: COPS Director, IT Director, Head of Digital channels and transformation, Head of Care, Head of Customer Fulfillment, Head of Customer operations, Head of Sales, Project Management Committee, Group Platforms stakeholders
Competencies:
You will lead “the brain of customer care and sales support” thru:
strong contribution to creation and mainly delivery of customer care and sales strategy for both consumer and business segments,
driving our customer care investments,
designing processes and systems for all frontline employees,
searching new ways how to automate and digitize,
experimenting, learning and helping us to manage and organize our internal customer care initiatives.
And last but definitely not least you will be along with your colleagues the voice of customer care around the company.
If you are open minded and creative but, structured and focused on delivery as well as having can-do attitude and able to see obstacles as an opportunity than you can be sure not to expect routine job with priorities “carved in stone for whole century” and tons of resources but, you can expect team who wants to do what is best for our customers, colleagues and company.
This will be piece of cake in case you are good with stakeholders as well as good listener. And, yes, some previous experience is needed, English language mandatory and Czech is big advantage.
And we offer you:
Here, we address each other informally and aren’t really bothered about a dress code… It suits us all just fine, and we hope you’ll feel good among us too.
Let’s not hide the fact that Vodafone is a big name – so we’re offering you the stable environment of our company, which is simultaneously a challenger on the telecommunications and data market.
We keep up with the times or even a step ahead, so with us you can enjoy 5 weeks of vacation, 5 personal days and optional home office… We also think about parents, with 16 weeks vacations for new parents and the option of returning to work sooner under exceptional conditions for moms.
Most of us currently work from home. We want to keep the increased ratio of remote working in the future.
If Vodafone, then full on – you will get a mobile phone and a great unlimited tariff, plus 24 000 benefit points per year which you can use in the cafeteria to buy vacations, educational courses or just to invite your dearest to the cinema.
We’re located on a metro line – right at the entrance actually – our headquarters are in Stodůlky. You’ll find everything you need in the building and the vicinity for your lunch break or coffee break, and you can even shop in the nearby stores.
And if you need to shake it off after work, you can grab one of the bikes we rent, or go to our gym located in the building.
At Vodafone, we’re passionate about creating inclusive workplaces where everyone can be themselves and achieve their best. For us, that means supportive teams and strong relationships where everyone’s contribution is valued - across social and cultural backgrounds, ethnicities, age, genders, gender identities, abilities, sexual orientation, and everything that makes us unique. We want the best people to join us and make their difference, so we will always consider requests for flexible working (such as full-time, part-time, home-working).
title: Head of Commercial Development

text: Pracovní nabídka Hledáme zkušeného Manažera kvality, který se připojí k našemu týmu ve strojírenské společnosti. Tato pozice je klíčová pro zajištění vysoké úrovně kvality našich výrobků a procesů. Pokud máte zkušenosti v oblasti řízení a zlepšování kvality, jste analytický a strategický myslitel a rádi pracujete v dynamickém prostředí, tato příležitost je pro vás. Pokud jste přesvědčeni, že splňujete požadavky a váš profesní profil odpovídá naší pozici, rádi vás poznáme osobně. Po obdržení vaší přihlášky budeme pečlivě posuzovat vaše informace a vybraným uchazečům se budeme brzy ozývat k domluvě na osobním pohovoru. Děkujeme za projevený zájem o tuto pozici a těšíme se na vaši přihlášku. Zajištění implementace a dodržování standardů kvality ve výrobním procesu. Vedení týmu a přímý dohled nad oddělením kvality. Plánování a realizace interních a externích auditů. Identifikace slabých míst ve výrobním procesu a návrh a dohled nad implementací opatření k jejich zlepšení. Spolupráce s výrobním týmem na zavádění nových postupů a technik. Monitorování výsledků kvality, sběr dat a příprava reportů pro vedení společnosti. Minimálně 5 let zkušeností ve strojírenském průmyslu, s důrazem na řízení a zlepšování kvality. Znalost norem a metodiky v oblasti řízení kvality (např. ISO 9001) a …. Schopnost analyzovat data a identifikovat zlepšovací příležitosti. Vynikající komunikační a prezentační dovednosti. Zkušenost s vedením týmu a motivací zaměstnanců. Vysokoškolské vzdělání v technickém oboru je výhodou. Možnost aktivně se podílet na vývoji a zlepšování kvality našich výrobků. Zaměstnání ve stabilní a rozvíjející se společnosti s dlouholetou tradicí. Motivační finanční ohodnocení a benefity. Možnost kariérního růstu a profesního rozvoje. Přátelské a dynamické pracovní prostředí. Úlohy a odpovědnosti: Požadujeme: Co nabízíme:

text: Product Specialist will work within the Vynamic View team of the Software Professional Services Global Center department. The Software Professional Services Global Center provides architecture-, product expertise and project support to the PS delivery organization covering the Diebold Nixdorf banking software product portfolio. This ranges from the creation of PS Solution offering for our customers to the hands-on work in implementing the solutions for our customers. The Global Center Vynamic View Professional Services team is responsible for appropriate architecture design and implementation of Vynamic View monitoring software at customer site, guidance, and training of other local teams. This role requires you to work within an international team of architects and product specialists. And other small things that make our lives more pleasant: Developing internal project estimates and cost models for the solutions proposed to the customer Playing a key role in the application design and implementation of customer solutions Owning and producing, in collaboration with the company solution specialist teams, functional and technical design documents, presenting the technical solutions to the client and supporting the teams during solution design and all integration aspects of the solution Managing relations with software architects, developers, operational personnel and technology stakeholders internally as well as within project organizations and/or existing customers Proactively building relationships with Delivery Teams to ensure a complete personal understanding of the client requirements and business issues to be addressed during project delivery Ensuring compliance to architectural and development standards during all phases of solution development Assure technical integrity between development projects and share best-practices across projects Aiding prospects with choosing the right set of products and designing the appropriate application-integration Maintaining a high level of technical understanding of the relevant business area and used technologies to be able to provide support and guidance to more junior team members Share knowledge, best practices, and experience by contributing to our technical Product Trainings and work as a Trainer for Customers, Partner and DN PS employees Experience in working in a distributed, global virtual team environment English language skills verbally and in writing at minimum Cambridge level B2 Exceptional communication skills and ability to communicate appropriately with customers, leadership, and technical teams Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Engineering or IT related field required Work experience in a comparable position for at least 3 years. Applications from graduates are also possible if they have the required technological and personal skills. Elementary knowledge of web technologies, and databases (SQL, Oracle) Knowledge of high availability and data security concepts for client-/server solutions, basic network knowledge (TCP/IP, TLS, OSI Layers) Experience in data analyzing/manipulation/transformation using scripting Proven experience of delivering technical projects in a quality focused environment Project experience in international environments Willingness to travel at short notice and spend longer periods abroad Enthusiastic, self-motivated individual with a customer-oriented mindset Independent and result-oriented way of working with a high sense of responsibility Superior analytical and problem-solving skills Master's degree on Computer Science or Information Technology Good understanding of service management (ITIL) Experience in banking industry is a plus Elementary knowledge of application servers (JBoss, Tomcat) Basic knowledge of the methodology (Agile) and tools of agile software development (preferably Atlassian Jira, Confluence, Bitbucket/GIT) Knowledge of Spanish language You will be offered a competitive salary with an annual bonus – We like to reward those who work to the fullest Career possibilities – Work to become a Team Leader or specialize and get deeper knowledge in your field Possibility to travel – You have the possibility to visit clients all over the world (or not travel at all if you don't want to) Flexible working hours – We trust each other, and we do things our way Working from home – While we love working from the office, there are days when staying at home is better Working from home allowance in amount of 705 CZK gross monthly Cafeteria bonus scheme in amount of 15.000 CZK per year– choose the benefit you like Pension insurance contribution – We like to plan for the future Two paid days for charity activities - text: Pracovní nabídka Business & Finance Analyst Prague, Czechia Full-time Company Description We are Straumann. United for global excellence in dentistry. Every vision has its story. Ours began more than 60 years ago. Since then, our innovations and achievements have become landmarks in dentistry worldwide. Straumann began as a family-owned institute, grew into a publicly owned holding, and today comprises several international companies around the world. Straumann Group develop, manufacture, and supply dental implants, instruments, biomaterials, CADCAM prosthetics, digital equipment, software, and clear aligners for applications in replacement, restorative, orthodontic and preventative dentistry. Culture People and culture are the Straumann Group’s greatest assets; they are the keys to high performance and sustainable success. The fundamental driver of this culture is the player‐learner mindset, which seeks to inspire and nurture in every employee. Your Role As part of a small finance team, the Business & Finance Analyst will focus on accounting, sales analysis, supervision of compliance with the terms of business contracts, management of budget processes and reporting for Country Manager (CM), sales team and other Straumann group departments. Person who joins the team will focus on accounting, closing, tax and reporting activities. It will manage all processes related to local finance and represent each other. Responsibilities Bookkeeping and tax records Posting invoices received, business trips Document archiving Processing the paperwork for the monthly accounts under the guidance of a local accountancy firm Processing the supporting documents for the annual accounts under the direction of the auditor and a local accounting firm Checking liabilities and claims Control and analysis of sales Budget and planning Monthly reporting of sales and financial data and KPI country manager and HUB financial manager Person will be contacted for: Internal audits and internal control system (ICS) Local accounting partner, billing Aim Together with your colleague / your colleague in the finance team, you will ensure smooth, reliable and compliant financial, accounting and control processes at the local branch of Straumann Group. Organizational integration: Business & Finance Analyst reports directly to Country Manager of a Czech subsidiary in Prague. Your Profile Higher business education (university) as well as deep professional experience in controlling/reporting/finance. As an enterprising, independent personality, Person needs to feel comfortable in the live environment and understands how to actively promote and implement her own initiatives. Good communication skills. A good command of the English language is a prerequisite for work (German is advantage) Experience in the areas of finance, controlling and reporting tongue Expertise in finance and controlling Advantage is knowledge of Helios Orange (currently used ERP system) Experience in international organizations Very good analytical skills Self-contained, solution-oriented and precise personality Social skills Cooperative, team player Initiative, communicative A pleasant demeanor Positive thinking  All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, or disability. Employment Type: Full Time Alternative Locations: Czech Republic : Prague Travel Percentage: 0 - 40%
title: Business & Finance Analyst

text: Pracovní nabídka Do našeho stále se rozrůstajícího se týmu, hledáme kolegy na pozici obchodní manažér. Nehledáme nutně člověka, který má zkušenosti na pozici obchodní manažér, ale člověka, který splňuje naše představy a má zkušenosti alespoň v oblasti e-commerce. ·         První půl rok shánět a pečovat o nové zákazníky, abyste si prošli procesem „obchoďáka“ ·         Domlouvat podmínky s novými dodavateli ·         Koordinace činností a spolupráce s ostatními odděleními ve společnosti ·         Vytvářet a následně zaváděn do procesů nové inovace ·         Vymýšlet obchodní strategii ·         Sledování trendů v oblast auto-moto nářadí ·         Vyhodnocovat výkonnostní ukazatele, včetně reportingu dat pro vedení ·         Analyzovat konkurenci ·         Správa limitů zboží ·         Vlastní organizace práce a týmu ·         Skvělé komunikační a vyjednávací schopnosti ·         Samostatnost, zodpovědnost a cílevědomost ·         Schopnost dotahovat věci do konce ·         Umění organizovat sobě i ostatním práci ·         Vůdčí charakter ·         Strategické a analytické myšlení ·         Znalost práce s Microsoft Office ·         Znalost analytických nástrojů (Google analytics) ·         Zkušenost v oblasti obchodního manažera, nebo na obchodní pozici v e-commerce  ·         Hledáme někoho, kdo ovládá soft skills a hard skills v oblasti obchodu. Těšit se u nás můžete na fajn kolegy a práci pouze během týdne. O víkendech a svátcích jsme doma a užíváme si odpočinku. Pracovat budete v mladém a dynamickém kolektivu stabilní a zavedené menší firmy, která je na trhu již 10 let, kde si tykáme, pořádáme firemní akce a kde nejste jen jedno z mnoha anonymních čísel. Jednáme seriózně a na rovinu, snažíme se ke každému přistupovat individuálně, protože nejen našich zákazníků, ale i zaměstnanců si ceníme. Každý z kolegů má možnost přispět svými nápady ke zlepšení a ovlivnit tak pozitivně dění ve firmě. Těšit se můžete i na proplácené vzdělání, protože potřebujeme abyste byli pořád v obraze. Občasná práce z domova je na této pozici samozřejmostí. Co budete dělat? Co od vás vyžadujeme? A co vám nabídneme zase my?
title: Obchodní manažér/ka v e-shopu Mojedilna.cz

text: Pracovní nabídka Job description Systal is a dynamic and innovative technology solutions provider that prides itself on the ability to deliver tailored solutions to meet business aspirations and challenges. We cover a wide range of services & solutions. From provisioning of optimum data availability and data integrity in a robust secure environment to the delivery of enterprise class wireless networking solutions globally. We are searching for all people interested in complex administration of customer datacenter networks. If you like new technologies, young team, you are excited for self-development and appreciate opportunity to touch different areas of providing customer service, it’s exactly you who we are looking for. It’s great entry point to wonderful world of network technologies and global customer solutions. Job definition: * Serves as primary support of network operations by managing customer devices and end-to-end services. Acting based on proactive reports to avoid network issues in the future. * Engages and coordinates equipment and service vendors, local site contacts and WAN providers to support network operations. * Responds to and may implement client requests and notifies them about network issues and possible impact to customer's business. * Acts on client's behalf in handling specific network requirements. Requirements: People needs to be located in Czech republic due to customer restrictions Fluent English (both written and verbal) Communication skills Team player Basic technical overview about LAN/WAN networks Working hours: 24/7 (3 shifts) Start and end of the shift is fixed

text:
Did you know that our Sales HUB located in Brno is growing?
We are looking for a sales development representative that will play a key role prospecting new customers and adding them into the sales funnel, increasing the market share and improving the business results.
The successful candidate will join a highly motivated and professional team, hungry for expanding the business in a sustainable way.
Principal accountabilities:
Make cold calls according to the business strategy, Persuasive Inquiry and prospecting techniques to find customer pain points and sales opportunities.
Qualify and nurture internal leads from automatic lead generation, inbound/outbound marketing, Hubspot and technical sources.
Handover qualified leads and new customer opportunities to the sales team, improving the hit ratio and presence.
Schedule business visits on new customers.
Further following up with closed leads who expressed interest but did not purchase.
Use C4C to manage calls, leads, opportunities, customer base and activities
Any other job responsibility assigned by the line manager
What are the key requirements?
Fluent level of English
Interest in sales with focus on target achievement
Communicativeness, love to debate, ability to deal with a variety of people in different way
Fast thinking, up for challenge, persistence and determination
Willingness to learn technical issues.
Ability to understand data analytics and basic finance
Experience of dealing with customers and working in a multicultural environment are considered a plus but are not necessary
We offer you a stable and friendly environment with:

• A place where friendly culture is not a cliché, we arrange regular teambuilding events, beers, movie quiz etc.

text:
KPMG Lighthouse tým v Praze je špička v regionu – pomocí dat a zlepšováním řízení dat pomáhá řadě klientům řešit jejich businessové výzvy a realizovat ambiciózní strategie.
Hledáme parťáka/čku, kterého/ou baví data, chce uplatnit své zkušenosti v oboru a chce se aktivně rozvíjet po lidské i odborné stránce. Pojďte nám pomoct navrhovat nová řešení postavená na Pythonu, pokročilé analytice, automatizaci, AI a machine learningu, podporovat juniornější kolegy v rozvoji jejich dovedností a hledat nová uplatnění inovativních technologií v českých i mezinárodních společnostech.
Jako konzultanti se podílíme na projektech z odvětví pojišťovnictví, bankovnictví a energetiky, přičemž propojujeme svět businessu, systémů a jejích dat.
Láká vás práce konzultanta? Rádi byste pomáhali klientům s řešením výzev v oblasti řízení dat? Baví vás navrhovat a implementovat chytrá řešení, projektový management a propojení znalosti byznysu a IT? Pak hledáme právě vás!
Co u nás budete dělat?
řídit vlastní projekty (pro lokální i zahraniční klienty) a tým konzultantů
komunikovat s klienty, koordinovat sběr požadavků a vést schůzky/workshopy
navrhovat vhodná klientská řešení a následně je přímo u klientů také realizovat
připravovat nabídky pro klienty a tím přispívat k novým obchodním příležitostem
podílet se na rozvoji dobrého jména českého Lighthouse týmu jak na lokálním, tak i na mezinárodním trhu, a to i včetně mezinárodní KPMG sítě (rozvoj mezinárodní KPMG metodiky pro pokročilé řízení dat, školení kolegů v jiných zemích o pokročilém řízení dat)
Co od vás očekáváme?
minimálně 3 roky zkušeností v oblastech datové analytiky (AI, Machine learning, Solution design, atd.) a programování v Pythonu
minimálně roční zkušenost s projektovým řízením a vedením týmu
skvělé analytické dovednosti a kritické myšlení
výborné komunikační a prezentační dovednosti
skvělou češtinu/slovenštinu a angličtinu alespoň na úrovni B2
samostatnost, odpovědnost a chuť přijímat výzvy
vysokoškolské vzdělání
Co získáte v KPMG?
profesní růst a podporu, včetně možnosti podívat se na nejrůznější projekty napříč trhem
možnost učit se od největších profesionálů v oboru
intenzivní rozvoj technických i měkkých dovedností
systematické vzdělávání (školení a certifikace), interní koučink
jazykové kurzy
možnost rychlého kariérního růstu
práci v centru Prahy ve stylových kancelářích s terasou, kolárnou a relax zónami
životní pojištění
mobilní telefon a firemní tarif s neomezenými daty, voláním a SMS
dovolenou navíc a tři dny celofiremního volna
každý týden zdravé občerstvení v kanceláři
společné akce pro celý tým (společné snídaně, teambuildingy)
30 000 Kč v kafeterii na sport, cestování, kulturu a další benefity

text:
In Commerzbank Counterparty Risk Cluster we provide efficient risk management for Counterparty Risk from Derivatives and Financing business. We utilize modern agile working methods to maximize our output for the costumer business. Our larger team is split into two cells in Frankfurt and one in Prague, which all collaborate to develop applications used by the entire bank.
Currently we are looking for skilled and motivated software engineers to strengthen our growing team in Prague. You would be joining a flexible environment with possibility of participating on several challenging projects.
As a Software Engineer for Databases you will:
Develop the application landscape of counterparty risk.
Work in an agile development environment (BizDevOps).
Work with 100% in-house development systems (mainly Java & SQL DBs on LINUX and some running in Cloud).
Support team’s iterative move towards new technologies (migration from Sybase to MSSQL)
Implement the concepts and associated automated tests and create technical documentation.
Ensure a high quality of the supplied software.
We are looking for someone with following skills and experience:
Technical:
Very good understanding of databases, database design, SQL, Unix Scripting, ETL, OOAD.
Good software engineering knowledge and conceptual thinking.
Knowledge of design patterns, new architectures, cloud computing and architectures, design patterns, best programming practices, enterprise patterns.
Preferable basic knowledge in Elastic Search/Kibana, Java/ Hibernate, Python or R or Scripting, Flyway, Kafka, Apache NIFI, Cloud computing basics, Built-Pipelines/Jenkins/ Ansible, Linux.
Personal
2+ years of professional IT experience in database development.
Highly motivated team player.
Very good communication skills in English – both written and spoken. Understanding basic German would be an advantage.
Preferable basic knowledge of investment banking products (options, swaps, etc.) and risk processes (credit and/or market risk) or financial engineering/CFA.
Learning and Development opportunities:
Our Digital Technology Center is home to more than 500 IT professionals and there is always someone to learn from or have a quick review. You will find unconventional thinkers here and speak English on daily basis. We encourage numerous ways of development activities and support our people with certification.
You will enjoy:
Home office to make sure you can have the right balance.
Flexible working hours within agile setup.
Generous package of 6 weeks of vacation, 6 sick days and up to 30 days of paid sick leave
A competitive salary with a very decent annual bonus system.
Special financial conditions and mortgage discount.
Prague offices to meet your team at the Charles Square Center, Karlovo náměstí within the reach of metro B line.
A sophisticated program of further professional training and personal growth.
Sponsored public transport card, Multisport card, retirement savings contribution, cafeteria system benefits, children summer camps contribution and free coffee.
Opportunity to travel to our Frankfurt headquarters.
A friendly, inclusive and open-minded company culture.
Amazing multicultural colleagues and so much more!
What is next:
Send us your professional details and we will contact you right away. You will meet your team lead as well as a technology expert to discuss all that interests you. We are happy to meet you in person and show you the office or we can get in touch via e-tools (audio/video conferencing).
title: Software Engineer for Databases in Counterparty Risk

text:
We are looking for a new colleague to strengthen our growing Counterparty Risk team. You will be responsible for safeguarding the bank’s capital and enable profitable client business. You ensure a correct processing and reporting of Counterparty Risk relevant data and exposures.
In Commerzbank Counterparty Risk Cluster provides efficient derivatives and financing business counterparty risk management. We utilize modern agile working methods to maximize our output to the costumer business. Our larger team is split into two sub teams one in Frankfurt and one in Prague, which collaborate together.
As Counterparty Risk Manager you will:
- Monitor and report counterparty, settlement and issuer risk in the Traded Products portfolio.
Investigation and escalation of limit overdrafts
Exposure monitoring and reporting (e.g. Indirect credit risk, concentration risk, wrong way risk)
- Data feed analysis and quality assurance
Plausibility/Sanity Checks of data delivered from FO trading systems (Murex/Summit/Apex/…) and support systems
Collateral data checks and investigations in the context of netting & collateral flagging
- Bilateral Initial Margin Dispute Analysis and Resolution – ISDA SIMM
Communicate with other Banks in order to resolve possible disputes
Identify weak spots and try to close them
- Determine, specify and test system improvements
Specification and close collaboration with our IT colleagues to enhance and ease processes of the systems you are working with
UAT for scheduled and emergency releases of the Counterparty Risk Infrastructure
We are looking for candidates with following skills and experience:
Technical
MS Office - Access , Excel (including basics of VBA)
SQL (at least basic knowledge is appreciated)
Optional R, Python
Personal
University degree in business / finance administration or related field of study.
At least basic knowledge of financial derivatives and interest in field of financial derivatives.
Previous experience in Counterparty risk management (or related fields eg. Credit/ Market risk) is appreciated.
Basic knowledge of Banking regulations would be an advantage.
Conceptual approach, good coordination and organizational skills.
Strong communication skills and team spirit.
Good communication skills in English.
Learning and Development opportunities:
Our Digital Technology Center is home to more than 500 IT professionals and there is always someone to learn from or have a quick review. You will find unconventional thinkers here and speak English on daily basis. We encourage numerous ways of development activities and support our people with certification.

text: Pro jednoho významného klienta, IT firmu, specializující se na Artificial Intelligence a Machine Learning solutions obsazujeme roli  A skilled and passionate Machine Learning (ML) Data Engineer, who will play a key role in ensuring the quality of data within client's processes, building and maintaining their Databricks Feature Store, and collaborating with data scientists to create a seamless data-driven environment for their projects. Equip data scientists with the ability to add new features to the feature store and support their data needs. Find ways to implement complex functions into easily accessible features within the feature store. Monitor feature stores, including feature usage, value, and organization into proper domains. Set up alerts to notify the team of any issues or problems. Excellent understanding of Python (pyspark, pandas, scikit-learn, ..). Knowledge of Machine Learning processes and techniques. Experience with Databricks and Spark is a great advantage. Self-driven and knowledge-hungry professional with commitment to personal growth. Proven experience in data engineering, data validation, and data management. Strong communication and collaboration skills. Professional working proficiency in Czech/Slovak + English. Competitive salary and benefits package. IČO contract for an indefinite period or employement contract. 5 weeks of paid holidays, with 1 extra day for each year of cooperation. Opportunity to work with cutting-edge technologies in the AI and Machine Learning industry. A supportive and growth-oriented work environment. Professional development in the form of internal and external training. The chance to make a meaningful impact on the future of technology. MACHINE LEARNING DATA ENGINEER. Zážitky a zkušenosti - Modulová výuka, přednášky, workshopy. Zakoušet a objevovat různé obory, formy a možnosti co jen svět nabízí. Bez testů, známek a úkolů - Škola má inspirovat, rozšiřovat fokus, nabízet možnosti a podporovat v individuálním rozvoji. U nás jsou individuální výzvy šité na míru – a škola je od toho, aby v případě potřeby podala pomocnou ruku. Učí profesionálové a inspirativní osobnosti - Setkání s profesionály, odborníky a Inspirátory napříč obory a prostředí - z firem, organizací, institucí, vědy, artu,... Perfektní angličtina, komunikace a ICT - Hlavní důraz je kladen na věci, které mladý člověk využije, ať ho život dovede kamkoliv. podílet se na obsahu modulů ve spolupráci s externisty z praxe připravovat hodiny plné zajímavých výzev, projektů s tandemovou spoluprací budete studenty inspirovat, doprovázet, koučovat a podporovat v jejich projektech budete pomáhat studentům zvládat neúspěch, konflikty, starosti, ale i radosti, nadšení a úspěch příležitost podílet se na tvorbě inovativního konceptu střední školy možnost uplatnit nejnovější psychologické a pedagogické poznatky spoluvytvářet inspirující, otevřené, spolupracující a respektující prostor schopnost podporovat osobní rozvoj žáků a jejich individualit schopnost práce se skupinovou dynamikou schopnost učit projektově schopnost ctít dohody a nezkreslovat informace, dodržovat profesní etiku sebezkušenostní výcvik nebo ochotu se v tomto ohledu dále rozvíjet pedagogickou kvalifikaci pro výkon profese učitele střední školy dle zákona o pedag pracovnících Pro nově vznikající Gymnázium KUDYKAMPUS v Praze hledáme pedagogický tým. text:
Our Financial Operations team is now looking for a proactive, customer and detail oriented Finance Analyst whose main responsibility will be to manage and resolve receivables and payment related queries received from the vendors of Amazon.
We’ll give you the opportunity to really make a difference to our business by working on and initiating projects in a fast-paced environment and ultimately delivering results.
The Financial Analysts’ responsibilities include but are not limited to:

Analyze receivable discrepancy (Commercial agreements, Vendor returns etc.) and fix issues in cooperation with the vendors of Amazon in order to issue on-time payments;
Reconcile vendor statements received from Amazon vendors with the open amounts in our ledger;
Respond to AR/AP debit balance related inquiries by phone or email with strong focus on Vendor experience and education;
Communicate with various internal departments such as Retail teams and finance processing teams in order to ensure timely and accurate payments;
Work with key accounts on various finance related issues and coordinate the long terms fixes.
BASIC QUALIFICATIONS
3+ years AP/AR experience
fluent French and English
PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS
Very good communication and analytical skills
Positive attitude towards issue resolution
Good MS Office skills
Amazon is an equal opportunities employer. We believe passionately that employing a diverse workforce is central to our success. We make recruiting decisions based on your experience and skills. We value your passion to discover, invent, simplify and build. Protecting your privacy and the security of your data is a longstanding top priority for Amazon. Please consult our Privacy Notice (https://www.amazon.jobs/en/privacy_page) to know more about how we collect, use and transfer the personal data of our candidates.
title: Senior Collection Analyst with French, retail AR France

text: We connect the world of business with technology from design to implementation. In Technology Consulting, you are not only part of PwC, but you get the opportunity to learn how it works in other companies as well. We are usually part of project teams responsible for the design and delivery of innovative and high quality Business and Technology solutions for our clients in the Czech Republic and other European countries. We develop our skills not only when working with our clients, but also in other activities. We have six communities where we learn about specific topics - New Technologies, Digital Strategies, Business Intelligence, SAP, Agile, ESG. Tomáš Karas is a senior manager who leads our team of data experts and business intelligence projects. On projects, he works as a data architect and project manager in one and, together with his teams, helps build large data warehouses, or uses data to simplify and automate processes, thus saving our clients 1000 days of boring operational work. When he is not working, you can either see him with the team somewhere after work for a drink, or he takes care of a small home zoo, including two children and about 80 guinea pigs from their family farm. Do you already have experience with data and want to further develop and educate yourself and be a leader for others? Do you want to immerse yourself more in large international projects? If so, join our team. You will look in large databases for specific data. You will lead young engineers and you will be the main intermediary for communication with the client. Thanks to that we have been able to redesign customer data quality processes and reduce boring operative manual work to our clients by thousands of hours per each month. Define cloud solution architecture design in data solutions. Definition of data governance standards and processes. Leading teams of data analyst and engineers for end to end delivery of data solutions. About our team: About hiring manager: Your role in our team What knowledge and skills do we expect? What do you get with us? Data transformation rules definition and implementation Report design and implementation Functional and technical design preparation Lead and guide junior colleagues University degree At least 5 years of experience Cloud knowledge and practical experience with one of the following - Azure, AWS, Google Cloud Practical experience with at least one of the following tools - Databricks, Kafka, Snowflake, Airflow, Azure Data Factory, Azure Pureview, BigQuery, AWS Glue, or similar cloud ETL or cloud data management tools Practical experience with at least one of the following programming language - Python, Spark, PySpark, Java, Scala, R, C# Experience with at least one of the following data management capabilities as data mesh architecture, master data management, data modeling in data vault, data governance Strong analytical thinking, communication and presentation skills Attention to detail, accuracy and punctuality Career experience in a prestigious consulting company Fair evaluation and annual salary increase 45,000 benefit points for sports, meal vouchers, to the pharmacy or for cultural experiences Computer and iPhone with unlimited data The possibility to set your work schedule flexibly. We also offer part-time work from home Regular professional training in various areas – business, technical and soft skills. Take a look at: Digital Upskilling Academy or our Technology communities, where we organize various trainings Network of interesting people – events are held at PwC every month (e.g. Closing Semester party, Lunch Breaks and others) Every month we have TC statuses, where we talk about how things look on our projects and then go on a joint activity (e.g. karaoke, indoor mini golf, etc.)

text:
Introduction
We help our customers accelerate life sciences research, tackle sophisticated challenges, improve patient diagnostics and increase laboratory efficiency. With $1.4 billion invested annually in R&D, our collaborative and diverse teams have the resources they need to drive discoveries and do cutting-edge research and develop important applications and tools that help millions of lives around the world.

Location/Division Specific Information
Thermo Fisher Scientific’s Chromatography and Mass Spectrometry division in Brno presents outstanding opportunity to join new growing team!

A day in the Life or Responsibilities
develop modules, classes and functions for the data system and user interface control of various mass spectrometry, gas chromatography, and peripheral devices and sub systems
create software for instrument control system of mass spectrometry instruments using mainly C# / .NET. The control system includes controlling various devices, and peripherals to run scans and modify the control parameters based on the acquired data set. Bring-up code/systems in lab and test software builds
work with the software scientist and other senior team members locally or remote to define the work product as user stories and accomplish them in agile sprints
work with field support in solving problems and reproducing customer issues, when required
document all the work as appropriate
Keys to Success or Requirements
school programming experience with C# and passion to learn and improve
data structures and basic computing algorithms including sorting and searching.
knowledge of network communication and peripherals control
degree in relevant technical field or equivalent professional experience with analytical devices
willingness to work in international teams and collaborate with user interface designers and help build prototypes followed by actual released products
experience working in an FDA regulated / CLIA / GLP development environment desirable
strong background in software design of systems and backend development
traveling to Germany may be occasionally required
How do we empower you
Be an important part of a company developing innovative technologies for analytical science customers worldwide!
We will support you in development and education, including language courses.
Each colleague is a part of an open company culture. We have company rock band, you can join Dragon boats team, ice hockey team, or enjoy with us many other sport and social activities.
We have modern work environment including relax zones, power yoga lectures, gym, outside playground and massages in the building. In the company canteen there is always fresh fruit and vegetable for free.
Brand-new innovation room equipped with VR headset, Recording studio for videos, music or podcasts, Lego Mindstorms, 3D printer, Arduino and much more
Flexible working hours to better balance personal life. 25 days of vacation and 3 sick days/year.
Option for partial home office (1 day per week)
Financial benefits - annual bonus, meal allowance, pension insurance allowance.
Further employee benefits - mobile tariff for you and family members for better prices, free Multisport card, possibility of life or health insurance with discount.
Excellent working equipment: notebook of high quality, company phone and two monitors are our standard, further office equipment based on personal preferences.
Still not sure? Come and take a look.
title: JUNIOR SW DEVELOPER C#

text:

Znalosti stávajících produktů a služeb ideálně KB, především jejich obchodní implementace a metodiky. Nejde o detailní znalosti, ale hlavně o celkový přehled, abychom byli schopni být partnerem pro experty z ostatních squadů
Znalosti z oblasti analýzy obchodních procesů
Analytické myšlení
Znalosti základních nástrojů – JIRA, Confluence, MS Office, power BI (uživatelsky)
Ostatní požadavky
Práce v dynamickém mladém kolektivu
Zajímavá práce, co propojuje starou a novou banku
Rozmanité oblasti – od účtů, přes úvěry po investiční bankovnictví
Práce pro všechny segmenty
Flexibilní pracovní doba ( minimálně 1x týdně Stodůlky)
Aktivní přístup k řešení zadaných úkolů
Nabízíme Vám
6 týdnů placeného volna (25 dní dovolené, 1 narozeninový den, 3 sickdays bez udání důvodu, 1 dobrovolnický den)
Plně hrazené e-stravenky v hodnotě 150 Kč za každý odpracovaný den (celkem až 33 000 Kč ročně)
Cafeteria v hodnotě celkem 6 720 Kč/rok - vyberete si odměnu podle sebe

Vzdělávání - nabízíme výběr kurzů pro osobní a kariérní rozvoj např. prostřednictvím platformy KB.edu, vybraných kurzů Seduo nebo přístupem do online platforem jako RedButton, Coursera a dalších.
Možnost Multisport karty i pro rodinné příslušníky
Bonusové ohodnocení dle targetu pozice
Komplexní Poradenský program (zdravotní, psychologická a právní poradna)
Příspěvek na doplňkové penzijní spoření ve výši 3 % z přiznané základní mzdy dle úvazku; minimální výše příspěvku zaměstnavatele činí 1 200 Kč/měsíc, povinný příspěvek zaměstnance je 100 Kč/měsíc.

title: Customer Journey Specialist - Future Proposition & Strategy

text:
Your tasks
The Analyst prepares decision papers or makes recommendations and is primarily responsible for credit synopses for which he/she has prepared the loan records. Guided by the highest quality standards in analysis and decision-making, the analyst takes into account the riskiness of an exposure to which he matches the amount of work and depth of analysis required.
The analyst works out possible loan structures and/or risk mitigation schemes with the competent group relationship manager.
He/she/they may get actively involved in meetings with customers in the case of risk-critical and/or complex credit structures.
Your profile
2-5 years of work experience within a financial institution.
Solid credit, finance or accounting background.
Able to manage a volume-driven workflow and work quickly and efficiently across multiple industries.
Familiarity with legal matters relating to the credit business.
Knowledge of the wide range of finance products.
Excellent verbal and written communication skills (English and/ or German), with ability to demonstrate initiative and a proactive approach to risk and data analysis.
Good experience with financial modelling/projections.
Analytical thinking and attention to detail.
Great team player and willing to work in an international environment.
The company
The newly established Global Credit Center in Prague is designed as a flexible, dynamic, and adaptable addition to the core units of credit risk management.
Our goal is to help risk management to streamline the workflows, increase the work-efficiency, help to comply with regulatory requirements and to enhance data-quality.
title: Analyst Corporates in Global Credit Center Prague

text:
Curious about data? Become a Functional Analyst
#problemsolvingskills #SQL #detailfocus
Do you have strong analytical & problem/solving skills? Are you familiar with SQL? Attention to detail and ability to work with large amounts of data is your own?
Role
As the Functional Analyst your main responsibilities will include:
Analysis and completion of business requirements
Participate on the particular part of BI solution development and delivery, especially in data definitions, data transformations, and data mapping areasleading the testing
Work on documentation and hand-over of the solution delivered
Deliver reports using standardised measurement and reporting tools
Prepare and evaluate proposals for changes in the respective area
What can you expect in first weeks/months?
Introduction plan and cooperation with the teamleader/manager
You will have a buddy – senior colleague supporting you in KBC within first months
Your professional development– a lot of interesting technologies, business areas in banking & insurance etc.
What do we expect from you?
To be fluent in English, both written and spoken
Experience in the analyst role in relevant business area
SQL knowledge including practical experience
General information systems and datawarehousing knowledge
Technologies you will meet
The system is built on Teradata technology, a unique HW + SW system for datawarehouses. Products of Informatica – one of the biggest software providers in the area of data processing, extraction, transformation and loading of the data are also included. SQL is the key tool used in most of teams.
Programming and automation: Java, Python, PHP
Database systems:Teradata, Oracle, Postgre
Tracking:JIRA, ServiceNow, Git, PowerBuilder
Reporting and calculations:QlikSense, WKFS OneSumX, Moody’s Risk Authority, Miliman
Where?
Modern CSOB headquarters in Prague (Radlicka)ČSOB Kampus -- ČSOB Kampus – Adapterra Awards
https://www.adapterraawards.cz/cs/Databaze/2020/CSOB-Kampus
We offer:
Flexible working hours
Very attractive salary + bonus scheme
Hybrid way of working (2 office days, rest can be remote)
Professional development & learning (English courses, WS…)
Employer's contribution to pension insurance
Up to 1000 CZK/month employer’s contribution for life insurance
Free ČSOB employee account and other ČSOB products with special employee conditions
Recruiter name:
Aleš Šťastný
By applying for this position, you hereby confirm that you possess all necessary permissions to stay and work in the Czech Republic.
title: Functional analyst in International Banking Project

text: Láká tě pracovat ve větší firmě, která má ale zachovanou rodinnou a neformální kulturu? Baví tě být blízko byznysu a mít možnost věci přímo měnit? Pak čti dál, protože možná hledáme právě Tebe! Náš senior analytik důkladnou analýzou zjistil, že má práce nad hlavu a rád se o ni podělí. 😊 Hledáme posilu, která nám pomůže se zorientovat ve všech těch číslech a tabulkách. * Spravovat a rozšiřovat přehledy v Google Analytics a Power BI. * Návrh metodiky, struktury a vizualizace analýz a reportů. * Připravovat analýzy a identifikovat dopady a rizika jednotlivých požadavků. * Podílet se na nastavování nových procesů. * Záliba v datech, jejich analýze a interpretaci.  * Zájem o obor, schopnost vidět detail, ale i širší kontext. * Bez základů datové analytiky/statistiky to bohužel nepůjde.  * Zkušenost s programovacím jazykem (ideálně Python).  * Angličtina na úrovni porozumění odborného textu.  * Budeš mít zajímavou práci na hlavní pracovní poměr v oblasti e-commerce. * Nakoukneš pod pokličku úspěšného e-shopu s obratem 1,5 miliardy. * Dostaneš u nás rozmanité příležitosti pro seberealizaci, osobní růst a rozvoj. * A také máme hromadu benefitů (stravenky, příspěvky na penzijní připojištění, 3 sick days, legendární firemní akce a grilovačky, VIP nákupy se slevou v rámci našich e-shopů, dog friendly office …). Proč hledáme nového kolegu/kolegyni? Čemu se u nás budeš věnovat? Co za zkušenosti/dovednosti se ti budou hodit? Proč do toho jít s námi?
title: Marketingový analytik – vhodné i pro absolventy!
